Transcription for 31732

It feels like all of my life I have been all run and scared
Now here I stand all alone all at home with myself
I was living in confusion created an illusion now I'm leaving my past behind
The best things in life are free and that's the way I'm gonna be
Like a bluebird on a wing this time I'm gonna swim
And there'll be no more crying no more crying for you no no
And there'll be no more singing those lost and lonely blues for you no
